Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the skill Tonly IoT skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your skill Tonly IoT devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your skill Tonly IoT account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the skill Tonly IoT app and can be changed
Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups)
Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

Depending on the types of devices your skill supports, choose example phrases from the Use Your Smart Home Device with Alexa page and replace [bracketed text] with names appropriate for your skill. Example:

"Alexa, turn on Bedroom."
"Alexa, set Downstairs temperature to 72 degrees."

If you have any questions, please visit the skill Tonly IoT FAQ at skill name/company name Link to Your US FAQ
